version_description:
* Tutorial lessons have been updated
* Improvements to Weekly Challenges in Multiplayer mode
* Fixed game pause
* Cabin view camera adjusted
* Enhanced steering wheel and tilt settings
* New crash effect
* Various tweaks and fixes
* Minor game balance adjustments

- NEW MAP - MIAMI WITH 20 new LEVELS!
- MULTIPLAYER UPDATE - your weekly medals and badges will now stay with you.
- PEDESTRIANS!
- CAR CONTROLS ADJUSTMENTS
- SMALL BUG FIXES

* New steering method added: Rotating Wheel
* Tutorial lessons update
* Game stability improvements
* Minor bug fixes

- NEW MAP - MIAMI WITH 24 new LEVELS!
- MULTIPLAYER UPDATE - your weekly medals and badges will now stay with you.
- PEDESTRIANS!
- IMPROVED CAMERA WORK
- CAR CONTROLS ADJUSTMENTS

- NEW MAP - MIAMI WITH 24 new LEVELS!
- iPhone X Display Compatibility
- MULTIPLAYER UPDATE - your weekly medals and badges will now stay with you.
- PEDESTRIANS!
- SMALL BUG FIXES

- NEW MAP - MIAMI WITH 24 new LEVELS!
- MULTIPLAYER UPDATE - your weekly medals and badges will now stay with you.
- PEDESTRIANS!
- Small bug fixes

* Winter is here! Snow has fallen in the cities and the roads are covered in a blanket of white. Take your cars for a winter driving test!
* New special vehicle - Santa's Sleigh.
* Christmas decorations can be seen around the streets.
* New EASY mode available in the store - all score penalties are reduced by half.
* Various game improvements.
* Lesson fixes and updates.
* Small bug fixes.

* Frozen Lake Drift School is now open!
* 18 new missions on new Frozen Lake map
* New car for drifting
* HORN added on players' special request
* Slight tweaks to driving interface
* Minor bug fixes
We’ve updated our privacy policy in accordance to the recent law changes. The game is now fully GDPR compliant. More information available in the app.

-A new season - Spring - has arrived to Car Driving School!
-Snow has melted down from the streets of California, Canada and New York.
-Various small bug fixes and improvements

- A new season - Winter - has arrived to Car Driving School!
- Holiday decorations can be seen around the world
- Santa’s sleigh are back in the garage
- A gift of 12 new missions in Santa’s Course mission pack
- Various small bug fixes and improvements

- Two new vehicles to drive: Double-decker Bus and Tow Truck with damaged Supercar
- Speed limits increased on all maps
- Difficulty adjusted on some levels (based on your feedback found in the reviews!)
- More realistic sense of speed
- Improved game performance on some devices
- Tweaks and bug fixes

- Two new vehicles to drive: Double-decker Bus and Tow Truck with damaged Supercar
- Speed limits increased on all maps
- Difficulty adjusted on some levels (based on your feedback found in the reviews!)
- More realistic sense of speed
- Improved game performance on some devices
- Tweaks and bug fixes

- Two new vehicles to drive: Double-decker Bus and Tow Truck with damaged Supercar
- Speed limits increased on all maps
- Difficulty adjusted on some levels (based on your feedback found in the reviews!)
- More realistic sense of speed
- Improved game performance on some devices
- Tweaks and bug fixes

* A new season - Fall - has arrived to Car Driving School!
* Halloween decorations can be seen around locations
* You can now look around in first person cabin view
* Various small bug fixes and improvements

- New vehicle: SUV with Horse Trailer
- 12 new missions in Sunny and Snowy mission pack for trailer vehicles
- Various small bug fixes and improvements

- A new season - Winter - has arrived to Car Driving School!
- Holiday decorations can be seen around the world
- Santa’s sleigh are back in the garage
- A gift of 12 new missions in Santa’s Course mission pack
- Various small bug fixes and improvements

- A new season - Winter - has arrived to Car Driving School!
- Holiday decorations can be seen around the world
- Santa’s sleigh are back in the garage
- A gift of 12 new missions in Santa’s Course mission pack
- Various small bug fixes and improvements

- A new season - Winter - has arrived to Car Driving School!
- Holiday decorations can be seen around the world
- Santa’s sleigh are back in the garage
- A gift of 12 new missions in Santa’s Course mission pack
- Various small bug fixes and improvements

-A new season - Spring - has arrived to Car Driving School!
-Snow has melted down from the streets of California, Canada and New York.
-Various small bug fixes and improvements

-Fall has arrived. Seasons change and so does our game.

-We’ve put out fresh pumpkins to the garage, there may be some spooky things happening too.

-There were some nasty bugs, but we’ve chased them away.

- CALIFORNIA REMASTERED!
- Newest version of our first map is now much prettier…
- …and more optimized, providing you with smoother driving experience!
- Map layout remains unchanged, so you will feel at home right away.
- We have reorganized order of cars in the garage. They were pretty heavy, but we’ve managed.

- Happy holiday! Winter is back in Driving School.
- Help Santa in this busy time by driving Santa’s Sleigh!
- California and Canada are now covered in snow.
- We’ve decorated California, Aspen and Canada with presents and Holiday ornaments.
- You may find some snowmen too, but don’t crash into them, they were good this year.
- We’ve found some bugs and fixed them right away.

- New map: Norway. Test your skills on narrow roads and sharp turns in free roam…
- …and on 12 new levels!
- School Bus has arrived! You have asked for it and we couldn’t refuse.
- Some bugs thought they could sneak past us. They couldn’t.

- Winter is gone, say hello to Spring!
- There were some bugs hiding from us, but they are gone now.
- There were some bugs running around, so we chased them off!
We are chasing some nasty bugs that bother some of you since last update.

- Car Driving School Simulator 3.0 is here! And with it...
- New car: The Instructor! Now you can become driving instructor and show others how it's done.
- New mission pack: Norway Bus! Test your bus driving skills on 6 new levels.
- Brand-new User Interface! Smoother, prettier and easier to use.
- Daily Activities! Complete daily tasks to earn rewards. Clear task board every day and you'll get FREE cars and more!

- Car Driving School Simulator 3.0.1 is here! And with it...
- New car: The Instructor! Now you can become driving instructor and show others how it's done.
- New mission pack: Norway Bus! Test your bus driving skills on 6 new levels.
- Brand-new User Interface! Smoother, prettier and easier to use.
- Daily Activities! Complete daily tasks to earn rewards. Clear task board every day and you'll get FREE cars and more!
- Based on your feedback we have readjusted fuel system. You will now get more fuel, it will regenerate faster and give you more time in Free Ride.
- Deluxe mode now also unlocks infinite fuel.

- Car Driving School Simulator 3.0.2 is here! And with it...
- New car: The Instructor! Now you can become driving instructor and show others how it's done.
- New mission pack: Norway Bus! Test your bus driving skills on 6 new levels.
- Brand-new User Interface! Smoother, prettier and easier to use.
- Daily Activities! Complete daily tasks to earn rewards. Clear task board every day and you'll get FREE cars and more!
- Based on your feedback we have readjusted fuel system. You will now get more fuel, it will regenerate faster and give you more time in Free Ride.
- Deluxe mode now also unlocks infinite fuel.
- We have found a few bugs and kindly, but firmly asked them to leave.

- New addition to Free Ride: Tutorial map!
- More improvements to user interface. Thank you for your feedback!
- Some bugs thought they could sneak past us. They couldn’t.

- New addition to Free Ride: Tutorial map!
- More improvements to user interface. Thank you for your feedback!
- It was bug hunting season and we have caught many.

- Even more improvements to user interface!
- We have updated some of the special offers to give you even better deal!
- If you haven't visited us for a while, now is the time to do so. We have prepared a gift for returning players!
- Bug hunting season never ends! We have caught and removed even more of them!
- We have found and removed particularly nasty bug that's been bothering some of you.

- We have kicked out another critical bug, that prevented some of you from playing...
- ...and we didn't stop there! We have also got rid of some smaller bugs that showed up recently.

- Manual gear shift! You can switch it on in settings menu from home screen.
- New steering button layout! Ever wanted bigger steering buttons? Now you can switch them on in settings menu from home screen.
- Some of you have asked if it's possible to reset your progress and play from the beginning again. And now you can! Use "Clear Save Data" from settings menu.
- We have made more improvements to user interface based on your feedback.
- We have fixes a bug that caused crashes in multiplayer...
- ...and got rid of some smaller bugs as well.

- We've made more small tweaks and improvements to user interface.
- We have found and removed a bug that switched on manual gear shift by default. If you want to change this setting again you can do so on "SETTINGS" screen.
- There were smaller bugs too, but they're gone now.

• Winter is here! Most maps are covered in blankets of snow!
• Santa’s back along with Santa’s Sleigh!
• With all that snow around pedestrians have donned warmer clothing, and so should you!
• Winter Holidays Decorations are everywhere! Can you spot all of them?
• Holiday season calls for Holiday Music! We’ve changed our theme in the menu!

- We've fixed an issue that caused some of you to lose saved progress.
- And we've fixed some smaller bugs too.
• We have fixed several issues including one that caused crashes in rare instances.
We have found and fixed some bugs hiding in the snow.
• We have found and fixed some bugs hiding in the snow.

• After busy holiday season Santa's Sleigh are going away for maintenance along with holiday decorations.
• There were some bugs burried in the snow, we asked them to leave and they did.

• After busy holiday season Santa's Sleigh are going away for maintenance along with holiday decorations.
• Bigger rewards! With new reward multiplier YOU control how much you earn for each lesson.
• Unsure what went wrong on your last lesson? Now you can check DETAILED HISTORY after each lesson! Just tap on the Details button right under your score and analyze your latest run.
• Some bugs were hiding in the snow but we’ve caught them.

• We've made improvements to make the game fully compatible with the newest OS version...
• ...and we've fixed few bugs.
